edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.ui

Class CharacterDesignMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.ui.CharacterDesignMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class CharacterDesignMenu
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Creates a character design menu, where the user can select a team of characters, and customize both character's statistics with a set number of stat points.
    Author:
    Matt Du
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calcTrans(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Calculates which transition to call and calls the corresponding method
      void drawMenuOne(java.awt.Graphics g, int x)
      Draws the first menu, where the user selects the primary character to be used in the game
      void drawMenuThree(java.awt.Graphics g, int x)
      Draws the stat selection string, where the user can adjust the statistics of the previously selected characters in preparation for the game.
      void drawMenuTwo(java.awt.Graphics g, int x)
      Draws the second menu, where the user selects the secondary character to be used alongside the first character.
      void handleInput(int keyCode)
      Divides the handling of the user input into 3 different methods, according to which menu the user is on
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Renders and double-buffers the window
      void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Divides the rendering jobs into different methods and calls the appropriate one according to the user inputs
      void reset(boolean isMC)
      Resets the base statistics of the character, given which character to reset.
      void run()
      Animates the menu and the transitions and 20ms between frames
      void transOne(java.awt.Graphics g)
      First transition method transitions from between menus one and two.
      void transTwo(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Second transition method transitions between menus two and three Called by calcTrans method

      • drawMenuTwo

        public void drawMenuTwo(java.awt.Graphics g,
               int x)
        Draws the second menu, where the user selects the secondary character to be used alongside the first character. The second character is the opposite gender of the first character
        Parameters:
        g -
        x -

      • drawMenuThree

        public void drawMenuThree(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 int x)
        Draws the stat selection string, where the user can adjust the statistics of the previously selected characters in preparation for the game. The screen is divided into two parts, and the user can use the arrow keys to modify each statistic individually before continuing
        Parameters:
        g -
        x -
